Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
Add Domain Tracker - Comprehensive network analysis tool for whitelist generation

Features:
- Depth-based web crawling with configurable link exploration (0-3 levels)
- CDN detection (Cloudflare, AWS CloudFront, Akamai, Fastly, Azure CDN, etc.)
- Third-party service tracking (Google Analytics, Facebook, YouTube, etc.)
- Resource details collection with type, size, and protocol statistics
- SPA (Single Page Application) link detection and navigation
- Session persistence for authenticated workflows (SSO/SAML support)
- DNS resolution with IPv4/IPv6 support
- Comprehensive whitelist export with detailed resource information
- Real-time crawling progress tracking
- Logout button prevention during automated exploration

Built with Electron and Playwright for cross-platform desktop automation.
